original_text: Who whet their tongue like a sword, and bend their bows to shoot their arrows, even bitter words:
korean_text: 그들이 칼 같이 자기 혀를 연마하며 화살 같이 독한 말로 겨누고

sentences.original_text: Who whet their tongue like a sword
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 혀를 칼처럼 날카롭게 하는 자들이요

sentences.original_text: and bend their bows to shoot their arrows
